episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Ball Guy training in the middle of the road...

Look who rolled up to say hi!
It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

I’ve been training rigorously in hopes of one
day being recognized as an official mascot!

I was hoping to keep how hard I’ve been
training a secret, but I guess the ball’s out
of the bag!

Of all people, I didn’t expect to run into you!
What a coincidence!

Huh?! No, I wasn’t just here for you to
find me!
But...since you ARE here...

Would you care to join me? Just know the
training is pretty intense.

For example, the first thing I’m going to
practice is handing out balls.

Then, pretending to be a harmless
Poké Ball—for when Pokémon feel
threatened and are about to attack.

...Followed by heaping praise on
higher-ups!

It’s actually top-secret stuff, but I don’t mind
teaching you!
(Agree to train together.)
Wow! You’re unbelieva-ball!
(Politely decline.)

You don’t mean that, right? Please, you’ve
gotta train with me!

So it’s settled, then! We’ll train together so
I can become Pasio’s official mascot!
Days later...

You’ve done a wonderful job
seeing my training to the end,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
After that regimen, I’ve nothing left to say!

To commemorate the occasion, let me gift
you this very special Poké Ball!

Ball Guy handed over headgear that looked
exactly like theirs!

Since we trained together, I’m sure by now
you’re also a Poké Ball enthusiast!

This gift is a secret sym-ball of our
friendship!

Now that we’ve trained together,
we’re even better friends!

I’m so glad I pretended you running into me
was a coincidence!
Ah...
Oops, that just rolled off my tongue!
I should fess up...

Actually, there’s a reason I reached out to
you specifically.

You’re a shining star who always works
hard to help others!

I’ve always respected you and all the work
you do, because Ball Guy’s all about
supporting others, too!

I wanted to learn your secrets, so I created
an opportunity to spend time with you!

Now that I think about it, you stuck with me
to the very end!

I think I understand now why you shine
so bright!

The reason you’re so popular is no matter
who you’re helping, you take them seriously
and give them your all!
I’d like to help those in need—just like you!

Then I won’t just be a Ball Guy...
I’ll be a good guy, too!
